s: I used sheet metal sheers to cut the boom mat for my application, then bent and molded it around corners, bumps, and dips. You can feel it firmly adhere to whatever surface you choose. This product is truly one of Amazon's best! ... I purchased these to use in a restoration for a classic muscle car. I loved the product, but for the price you don’t get a lot of mats. I was planning to make a second purchase and discovered a different brand ...
